name: Semiconductor
description: Description of what the mod does.

parameters.name: primaryKeyColumns
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of column names that make up the primary key

parameters.name: targetColumnTitles
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of column titles to use as the target columns. Must have same number of items as targetColumnValues

parameters.name: targetColumnValues
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of column values to use as the target columns. Must have same number of items as targetColumnNames

parameters.name: targetMeasure
parameters.description: The aggregate measure to use on the target columns

parameters.name: outputDataTableName
parameters.description: The name of data table that will be created as a result of the transformations

scripts.name: Trigger a Data Function registered in the current document.

parameters.name: dataFunctionName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Function to execute
